Data.title: ALFA SHOLALLAH
Data.lyrics:
Alfa Shollallah bithoha mil ‘aini
Nurul Hudaa ya Rosulallah
Alfa Shollallah bithoha mil ‘aini
Nurul Hudaa ya Habiballah

Ya Rosulallah salamun ‘alaik
Ya Rosulallah salamun ‘alaik

Salawatullah ‘alaik

Ya Habiballah salamun ‘alaik
Ya Habiballah salamun ‘alaik

Data.title: ALLAHU ROBBI
Data.lyrics:
Allahu robbi, robbi ta'ala
Ya habibi ilmi, ahla sya'ni wa majdi
Allahu robbi, robbi ta'ala

Sholawatullahi 'ala ahli baitihi
Sholawatullahi 'alal musthofal murtadho
Sholawatullahi 'alal musthofa hadzroh
Sholawatullahi 'ala khairil waro

Data.title: HUWANNUR
Data.lyrics:
Huwan-nuuru yahdiil haa-iriina dliyaa-uhu
Wa fiil hasyri dhillul mursaliina liwaa-uhu
Talaqqoo minal ghoibil mujarrodi hikmatan
Bihaa amthorot fil khoofiqoini samaa-uhu
Wa masyhuudu ahlil haqqi minhu lathoo-ifun
Tukhobbiru annal majda wasya, wasyaa-uhu
Fallillaahi maa lil'aini min masyhadijtilaa
Ya'izzu 'ala ahlil hijaabijtilaa-uhu
Ayaa naazihaan 'anniy wa maskanuhul hasyaa
Ajib man malaa kullan-nawaahiy nidaa-uhu
Ajib man tawallaahul hawaa fiika wamdhi fii
Huwan-nuuru yahdiil haa-iriina dliyaa-uhu
Wa fiil hasyri dhillul mursaliina liwaa-uhu
Talaqqoo minal ghoibil mujarrodi hikmatan
Bihaa amthorot fil khoofiqoini samaa-uhu
Fu-aadiya maa yahwaal hawaa wa yasyaa-uhu
Banal hubbu fiy wasthil fu-aadi manaazilaan
FaLillaahi baanin faaqo shun'an binaa-uhu
Huwannuur

Data.title: IHDZARU
Data.lyrics:
Ihdzaru ma'asyiros syuban
Waj tanibu ghowa ilaz zaman
Wattaqu Robba kumur rohman
Mada matil arwahu bil abdan

Wattaqu Robba kumur rohman
Mada matil arwahu bil abdan

Tazawwadu bil 'ilmi wal iman
Tafaqqohu fiddini wal qur'an
Tazawwadu bil 'ilmi wal iman
Tafaqqohu fiddini wal qur'an
Ijtahadu aya syubban
Qobla ajsadi kumudan

Data.title: INNAL HABIBAL MUSTHOFA
Data.lyrics:
Innal Habibal Mushthofa

Dzuu rofati waa dzu wafaa

Wa dzikruhu fiihis-syifaa

Idzaa tamaadaa bil ‘ilal

Wa dzikruhu fiihis-syifaa

Data.title: ISYFALANA
Data.lyrics:
Ya Rasulallah ya ya nabi, laka syafa'ah wa hadza matlabi ya nabi
Antal murtaja yaumaz ziham, isyfa'lana ya ya khoirul anam
Isyfa'lana lana lana ya habibana
Laka syafa'ah ya Rasulullah, ya ya habibana
Ludna bika ya ya habibun, anta lil kholqi ya ya thobibu
Isyfa'lana lana lana ya habibana
Laka syafa'ah ya Rasulullah, ya ya habibana
Ji'talil baroyah bisyar'il mubiin, tansyurul hidayah bainal alamin
Isyfa'lana lana lana ya habibana
Laka syafa'ah ya Rasulullah, ya ya nabi

Data.title: Maula Ya Sholli
Data.lyrics:
Maula ya salli wa sallim da’iman abadan
‘Ala habibika khayril khalqi kullihimi

Maula ya salli wa sallim da’iman abadan
‘Ala habibika khayril khalqi kullihimi

Muhammadun sayyidul kawnayni wath-thaqalain
Wal fareeqaini min ‘urbin wa min ‘ajami

Maula ya salli wa sallim da’iman abadan
‘Ala habibika khayril khalqi kullihimi

Huwal habibul-ladhi turja shafaa’atuhu
Li kulli hawlim-minal ahwali muqutahimi

Maula ya salli wa sallim da’iman abadan
‘Ala habibika khayril khalqi kullihimi

Da’awatuna ‘alayka ya kharatallaahi
Mawlaya salli wa sallim da’iman abadan

Maula ya salli wa sallim da’iman abadan
‘Ala habibika khayril khalqi kullihimi

Data.title: SHOLAWAT JIBRIL
Data.lyrics:
Shallallah ala muhammad

Shallallah alaihi wasallam

Shallallah ala muhammad

Shallallah alaihi wasallam

Anta Syamsun Anta Badrun

Anta nurun fauqo nurin

Anta Syamsun Anta Badrun

Anta nurun fauqo nurin

Anta iksiirun wa ghoolii

Anta mishbaahush-shuduuri

Ya habiibii Ya Muhammad

Ya 'Aruusal-khoofiqoini

Ya Mu-ayyad ya Mumajjad

Ya Imaamal Qiblataini

Data.title: SHOLAWAT NARIYAH
Data.lyrics:
Allahumma shalli shallan kamila,
wa sallim salaman tamma,
'ala sayyidina Muhammadin alladhi
tanhallu bihil 'uqadu,
wa tanfariju bihil kurabu,
wa tuqda bihil hawa'iju,
wa tunalu bihir ragha'ibu,
wa husnu al khawatimi,
wa yustasqa al ghamaamu biwajhihil kareem,
wa 'ala alihi wa sahbihi
fi kulli lamhatin wa nafasin
bi'adadi kulli ma'lumilaka.

Data.title: SHOLAWAT QURANIYAH
Data.lyrics:
Sholatullahi wa salam - 'ala man uhiyal quran
Wa ahli baitihil kiram - wa shohbihi dzawil quran
Salamullahi wa ridwan - 'ala man a'dhamal quran
Biqolbin khalishin nawa - muhibbin raghibil quran
Fathuba man ta'allama - wa bad'a 'allamal quran
Sholatullahi wa salam - 'ala man uhiyal quran
Wa ahli baitihil kiram - wa shohbihi dzawil quran

Data.title: SYAHRUR ROBBI
Data.lyrics:
Syahrur-robii’i waafaanaa aqbal ‘alainaa hannaanaa
Fiihi ataanaa rosuulullaah fiihi ataanaa habiibullaah
Biddiini haqqon ataanaa
Syahrun bihi jaa-ar-rosuul al-haasyimii baabul wushuul
Biquduumihi nilnaal qobuul subhaana man qod a’thoonaa
Syahrun bihi nilnaal hudaa wa bihi-njalaa ‘annaar-rodaa
Biquduumihi lammaa badaa min kulli khothbin najjaanaa
Yaa robbi sholli yaa salaam ‘alaan-nabii maahiidh-dholaam
Wal aali washshohbil kiroom fasysyahru fiihi ghonnanaa

Data.title: SYAIKHONA
Data.lyrics:
Ma'as-salaamah fii amaanih Syaikhonaa

Allaahu Robbi-rham murobbii ruuhinaa (Yaa Robbanaa)

 

Ma'as-salaamah fii amaanih Syaikhonaa

Allaahu Robbi-rham murobbii ruuhinaa (Yaa Robbanaa)

 

Ya badrotim ya badrotimmin haza kulla kamaali

Maaza yu'a maaza yu'abbiru 'an 'ulaaka maqoalii

Solla 'alaikallahu robbii robbii daa'iman

Abadan ma'al ibkaari wal asoalii

Data.title: MAN ANA
Data.lyrics:
Man ana, man ana, man ana laulaakum
Kaifa maa hubbukum, kaifa maa ahwaakum
Man ana, man ana, man ana laulaakum
Kaifa maa hubbukum, kaifa maa ahwaakum

Maa siwaaya wa laa ghayru-kum siwaakum
Laa wa man fii-l mahabbati 'alayya wulaa-kum
Antum, antum muruudii wa antum qashdii
Laysa ahadun fii-l mahabbati siwaakum 'indii

Man ana, man ana, man ana laulaakum
Kaifa maa hubbukum, kaifa maa ahwaakum
Man ana, man ana, man ana laulaakum
Kaifa maa hubbukum, kaifa maa ahwaakum

Kullamaa zaada-nii fii hawaakum
Wajdii qultu yaa saadatii muhjatii tafdhaakum
Lau qotho'tum waridii bi-haddi maadh-lii
Qultu wallaahi ana fii hawaakum roodlii

Man ana, man ana, man ana laulaakum
Kaifa maa hubbukum, kaifa maa ahwaakum
Man ana, man ana, man ana laulaakum

Data.title: MAUJU QOLBI
Data.lyrics:
mauju qolbi. wittangaaabbeyya

min abaawa ngala ruuhi yingkisir qolbi ngalayya

ta'baani wajhi wanguyyuni kaharatni

mauju qolbi. wittangaaabbeyya

min abaawa ngala ruuhi yingkisir qolbi ngalayya

ta'baani wajhi wanguyyuni kaharatni

dun ya sallat hal haali wibhayati karahatni

karahtil hubb. mariidah dammarni

toyyib inni wadri toyyib hal haaali washolniii

mauju qolbi. witangaabbeyya

min abaawa ngala ruuhi yingkisir qolbi ngalayya

Data.title: MUHAMADD NABINA
Data.lyrics:
Muhammad nabina Binuru hadina
Min makkah habibi nuru Shota’al madinah

Min sholla sholatuh Widkhalab shifatuh
Ya bahtilif duluh ma’shi Yushfa’luh mamatuh

Ya imamna ya amin Ya sanad lil muslimin
Ya habibi ya muhammad Yabna abdillah
Tammiti risalah tamam Wil habib miskil khitam
Thul hayah wuksholah Bada’a sholli waro

Min awwil yumta ‘umri
Sim’atahu ya ‘umri
Bi shollu ‘alaih (Allahumma sholli’alaih)
Allah. .

Hafizni bil iman Hassisni bil aman
Wata’alak thibi

Allahumma sholli wa sallim wa barik ‘alaih x 2

Miftah syufak fil manam (Ya rosulallah)
Wabka ‘ala kitbak wanam (Ya habiballah) x 2

Wanul syarok lu ashuhbita
Wakhobri usbuk ummita
Wadhamatik. . .

Muhammad nabina Binuru hadina
Min makkah habibi nuru Shota’al madinah
Ya habibi ya thoha Ya maghamil maghamah
Ghayyar biddunyab ‘ainina Bililau dhuha. . .
Min sholla sholatuh Widkhalab shifatuh
Ya bahtilif duluh ma’shi Yushfa’luh mamatuh

Data.title: NURUL HUDA WAFANA
Data.lyrics:
Nurul hudaa wafanaa, bihusnihi ahyaanaa
Wa billiqoo hayyanaa, shollaa 'alaihi maulaanaa
Ahlan bihi wa sahlan, qod thooba fiihil majlaa
Hallal haana mudhalla, shollaa 'alaihi maulaanaa
Hadzal malaadzul'adziim, hadzar roufur rohiim
Ataa biqolbin saliim, shollaa 'alaihi maulaanaa
Yaa rohmatal 'alamiin, yaa ni'matal ahkamiin
Muthoo'an tsamma amiin, shollaa 'alaihi maulaanaa
Nurul hudaa wafanaa, bihusnihi ahyaanaa
Wa billiqoo hayyanaa, shollaa 'alaihi maulaanaa

Data.title: AL QALBU MUTTAYAM
Data.lyrics:
Alqolbu mutayyam bithôhannabî

Wa shollâ wasallam ‘alâ Thôhân-nabî

Nabînal mukarrom nabînal musyarrof

Thôhal ‘arobî Thôhâl ‘arobî

Ahmadun hadânâ walmaulâ qod syâ’

Bil khoiri atânâ wa bilhaqqi jâ’

Littaqwâ da’ânâ lidarbirrojâ’

Wal maulâ aghnânâ biThôhan-nabî

Yâ Rosûlallâh jita bil~Qur’ãn

Min wahyil ilâh maulânâr-rohmân

Wa bi’aunillâh nasyartal imân

Yâ habîballâh Yâ Thôhân-nabî

Kam yakhthû fu~âdî litilkad-diyâr

Wa bisyauqin yunâdî syâfi’il mukhtâr

Qod thôlabtihâdî ‘an aghlâ maqôm

Wal hajju murôdî wa diyârun-nabî

Data.title: MUHAMMAD IBNI ABDILLAH
Data.lyrics:
Ya Rasulallah, ya habiballah

Muhammad ibni Abdillah, Muhammad ibni A'bdillah

Muhammad ibni Abdillah, wa yaa qoori kitabillah

A'laika qubbatul khodroo, tujaadi fii sabiilillaah

Ya Rasulallah, ya habiballah

Muhammad ibni Abdillah, Muhammad ibni A'bdillah

Muhammad ibni Abdillah, Muhammad ibni A'bdillah

Muhammad qoola yaa robbii, suaalii ummatii ba'dii

Wa sammi'hum minaz zanbi, wa goffaaro zunuuballah

Data.title: SHOLAWAT ANTASSALAM
Data.lyrics:
Alhamdulillah ma syabbal huda wa haba
Wama takallama jitsron fil hasa taroha

Wahina manza habadrullah gisha allahu
Tagarroqo subhu fil kaffay ya wantasoba ha

Allahummantassalam waminkassalam
Tabarokta robbana ya dzal jalali wal ikrom
Allahummantassalam waminkassalam
Tabarokta robbana ya dzal jalali wal ikrom

ya rabbal'alamiin ya rahman ya rahim
sali rabi wasalim 'ala khayrilmursilin

ya rabbal'alamiin ya rahman ya rahim
sali rabi wasalim 'ala khayrilmursilin

allahum 'antasalam waming kasalam
tabarakta rabbana yazaaljalali wal'iikram
allahum 'antasalam waming kasalam
tabarakta rabbana yazaaljalali wal'iikram

alhamdulilah masyabalhudaa wahaba
wa matakallamaljid 'ufil hasya taraha

wahinamazah badruallah ghisha'alahu
tawarraqa subhu fi kafain tasaba
